name: Aethir
description: Aethir is the only Enterprise-grade AI-focused GPU-as-a-service provider in the market. It’s a decentralized cloud computing infrastructure allows GPU providers (containers) to meet Enterprise clients who need powerful H100’s chips for professional AI/ML tasks. Aethir also support cloud gaming clients with their virtual computing phones and GPU's with contracts with the world’s largest telecommunication company. Everything within Aethir ecosystem will be decentralized and community-owned.
